text.Words: Andruss: Toast! Thank Staratreem you're still alive! I thought the spores got to you with your signals being unable to go through the mushroom!
Toasterman: Don't worry, I'm still breathing and kicking, as you would say.
Andruss: Yes, I say that... {anyway} you're still alive which is good. What even caused those spores to come about?
Toasterman: Yes, it seemed to be putting the spores up as both cover of their presence and food to convert into more goo.
Andruss: Oh this is bad, this is {really bloody bad!}
Toasterman: Correct, if this continues then we will be reaching a great problem in the Breadland system.
Andruss: Aye, we need to get the boss on board for this, let me just call him real quick!
Andruss: Ok so the boss said it's nothing to worry about as long as it doesn't lose him money. That's rather stupid if you ask me.
Toasterman: Of course it is, it's humans that are running this.
Andruss: That is true, we are running this whole planetary economy.
Toasterman: Yes, but this is getting ridiculous,
Toasterman: The lack of care towards the system. It's completely unreasonable to think it's all fine to let it drive itself to death.
Andruss: Yea, you could try and stop this menace though, I'll make sure you can get it done. I also wonder who that figure giving you all th powerups is...'
Toasterman: As do I, but we must get back as soon as possible. See you
